# counterSets

**Instance Property**

The counter sets supported by the device object.

## Declaration

```swift
var counterSets: [any MTLCounterSet]? { get }
```

## Sampling a GPU device’s counters

- **supportsCounterSampling(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether you can read GPU counters at the specified command boundary.
- **MTLCounterSamplingPoint**: Options for different times when you can sample GPU counters.
- **makeCounterSampleBuffer(descriptor:)**: Creates a counter sample buffer.
